moreBlocks.lawyersAtWhitleyLawFirmSelectedForASuper: • Whitley, Robert E. On a Super Lawyers® List

description:
Located in Jacksonville, North Carolina, the Whitley Law Firm focuses on a wide range of personal injury matters. Having obtained millions of dollars in compensation for thousands of clients, our attorneys are passionate about defending the rights of the suffering. We accept clients across North Carolina.

We have extensive experience in such personal injury issues as motor vehicle accidents, including motorcycle, truck and pedestrian accidents, as well as construction accidents, dog bites, premises liability and dangerous or defective products. In the area of medical malpractice, we are skilled in recognizing and pursuing action against those responsible for nursing home abuse, hospital and surgical errors, defective medical devices and dangerous prescription drugs. We are also knowledgeable in workers' compensation and Social Security Disability law.

Several of the attorneys at our law firm have received the distinction of being rated AV Preeminent* by Martindale-Hubbell, a peer-rated review service that recognizes commitment to high legal standards and outstanding client treatment. Having over eight decades of combined experience, we have developed a reputation in the legal community for our energy in the courtroom and ability to develop strategies with a high rate of success.

At the Whitley Law Firm, we are concerned about the emotional well-being of our clients, as well. We know that when clients seek our help, they are likely to be worried about the legal process and their futures. We commit to answering phone calls and inquiries promptly and honestly, as well as showing compassion and understanding for each person's situation. We offer a free initial consultation.

*AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review Rating falls into two categories: legal ability and general ethical standards.
